'''13w25b''' is the sixteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 18, 2013<ref>{{tweet|dinner|347010330943160322}}</ref> which makes swords no longer break blocks in [[Creative]] mode and fixes some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w25a]] snapshot.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:Wooden Sword JE1 BE1.png|width=40x40]][[File:Stone Sword JE1 BE1.png|width=40x40]][[File:Iron Sword JE1 BE1.png|width=40x40]][[File:Golden Sword JE2 BE1.png|width=40x40]][[File:Diamond Sword JE1 BE1.png|width=40x40]]'''[[Sword]]s'''
* It is no longer possible to break blocks with swords in Creative mode.
